title: Title
advanced_settings_description: Customize various aspects of your gacha.
gacha_simulator_shared_result_text: Public URL of gacha simulator results
discount_price_per_n_gachas_w_val: Discounted price per {{count, number}} gachas: {{price, number}}
pity_item_w_trigger: {{count, number}} gachas will guarantee the following item
items_customized: Items will be pulled from within the configured item pool

tier_ratio.body: The probability of pulling an item that belongs to a given tier will be the ratio of a tier divided by the sum of ratios.

customize_items.body: Enable to customize which items to be chosen from. A random item will be selected within a tier if disabled.

add_items.body: Select to add items to the item pool.

item_ratio.body: Enter the ratio of item within the same tier.

presets.body: Select one of the presets and each field will be entered automatically.

price_per_gacha.body: Enter the price per single gacha.

discount.body: Enable to configure discounted price per multiple gachas.

discount_trigger.body: Enter the number of gachas that will trigger discount.

discount_price_per_gacha.body: Enter the discounted price per gacha.

pity.body: Enable to configure the pity system. A pity item is guaranteed after a certain number of gachas.

pity_trigger.body: Enter the number of gachas that will guarantee a pity item.

budget.body: Enter the budget. Gachas will be pulled within the budget.

max_consecutive_gachas.body: Enter the maximum number of gachas. This takes precedence over the budget.

item_number.body: Enter the number of wanted items.

tier_number.body: Enter the number of wanted tiers.

error.fetch_fail_game_title: Failed to load game title info.
error.fetch_fail_presets: Failed to load presets. Click to reload.
error.url_copy_fail: Failed to copy URL {{url}} to clipboard.
error.tier_ratio_zero: The sum of tier ratio is zero.
error.items_too_large: The number of items is too large.
error.item_ratio_zero: The sum of item ratio is zero.
error.discount_gt_price: The discounted price per gacha is greater than the price per gacha.
error.gachas_zero: The number of gachas you can pull is effectively zero.

All product names, logos, images and brands are property of their respective owners. If you are affiliated with any of the game titles listed in this website and you want a particular game title taken down from this website, please kindly send me an email via {{email}} and I shall do so as soon as possible.
